text: 1) Sign of P x Q = (Sign of P) & (Sign of Q) 2) Exponent of P X @ = (Exponent of P) + (Exponent of Q) — 127 3) Mantissa of P x @ =1.Mantissa of P X 1.Mantissa of Q Since, P = 1100 0001 1000. . . and @ = 0011 1111 0101.... So,Signof Px Q=1@0=1 Exponent of P x Q =131 + 126 — 127 = 130 Mantissa of P x @ = 1.000... x1.101... = 1.101... So, P x Q =1 10000010 10L... So, P x @ = 1100 0001 0101 = C'15 (Option (C))
